#summary How to install CSSMatch ?
#labels Featured

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />
<br>

  # [http://code.google.com/p/cssmatch-plugin-en/wiki/Downloads?tm=2 Download the plugin]
  # Extract the archive on your computer (e.g. with [http://www.7-zip.org 7Zip])
  # Send the content of the _addons_ folder in the server's _addons_ folder
  # Send the content of the _cfg_ folder in the server's _cfg_ folder
  # Reboot your server

<br>
== Check the installation :==
  # Type the following command in the server's console (using RCON or [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/HLSW HLSW]) : `plugin_print`. This command displays the list of the plugin installed on your server.
  # Make sure that CSSMatch is listed
    * If no, install CSSMatch again
    * If yes, your installation is correct

<br>
=== If you have some problem : ===
Don't forget to write all the steps you followed to install CSSMatch (even if you repeat this tutorial).

<br>
_*Note : If your server runs on a 64 bits machine and you experience some problems to install CSSMatch, please try this workaround : http://code.google.com/p/cssmatch-plugin/issues/detail?id=15&colspec=ID%20Status%20Summary#c7 *_
